EmailTemplate.subject: Get the latest from Teladoc Health
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
February 2023 Employer Newsletter An inside look for employers
Meet our new integrated member experience <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/organizations/employers/]]>
Care coordination is a challenge your members face every day. In fact, 64% of members living with 3+ chronic conditions say having better access to a coach would be helpful. That’s just one of the insights from our recent 7,800+ consumer study. The study’s findings underscore the importance of connecting people living with chronic conditions to primary care and mental healthcare to create the full whole-person care experience. I’d like to invite you to read the research report <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/resources/report/living-with-chronic-conditions-healthcare-experiences-challenges/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=NWSLTR-202302-EMP-CC-NEWSLETTER-FEB&utm_campaign_id=CC02/]]> to learn more.
In this issue you’ll find employer materials and new client success stories that show what your peers are doing to demonstrate the power of whole-person care when managing chronic conditions.
And, as always, thank you for being a valuable partner as we continue to learn and improve our solutions in the name of better health.
Kristen Moody Chief Client Officer Teladoc Health
Employer resources
An employer’s guide to diabetes management vs. reversal programs When choosing a virtual diabetes management solution, it’s hard to know which type of program is best for your employees. We help break it down. Get the guide <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/resources/brochure/employers-guide-diabetes-management-vs-reversal/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=NWSLTR-202302-EMP-CC-NEWSLETTER-FEB&utm_campaign_id=CC02]]>
Multi-program chronic condition solutions amplify outcomes Chronic conditions are prevalent, costly and don’t exist in isolation. Get a snapshot of how our integrated chronic condition management solutions improve outcomes and reduce costs with this infographic. See the infographic <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/resources/case-study/chronic-condition-cohort-study-infographic/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=NWSLTR-202302-EMP-CC-NEWSLETTER-FEB&utm_campaign_id=CC02]]>
Employer case study: Simplifying access to whole-person care across a global population The complex needs of this dispersed global membership of 92,000 required a solution that gives members access to high-quality whole-person care, no matter where they are and when they need it. Read it now <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/resources/case-study/simplifying-access-to-whole-person-care-across-a-global-population/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=NWSLTR-202302-EMP-CC-NEWSLETTER-FEB&utm_campaign_id=CC02/]]>
Events We hope to see you at some of these upcoming events:
State and Local Benefits Government Association 2023 Conference April 2-5 | New Orleans, LA | Register now <[[https://www.salgba.org/events/]]>
The Conference Board: 2023 Annual Employee Health Care Conference Hear from employers and industry experts on how a hybrid care approach has resulted in more optimized experiences and how a virtual whole-person care strategy improves outcomes. Register for free today with coupon code Tela23. March 30-31 | San Diego, CA | Register now <[[https://www.conference-board.org/events/employee-healthcare-san-diego]]>
April 18-19 | New York, NY | Register now <[[https://www.conference-board.org/events/employee-healthcare-new-york]]>
Business Group on Health 2023 Annual Conference Hear thought leaders deliver key insights surrounding virtual primary care and impacts on health equity, as well as examine how to drive success with a virtual approach to care that integrates with the rest of the healthcare ecosystem. April 26-28 | Washington, DC | Register now <[[https://www.businessgrouphealth.org/annual-conference]]>
Save the date: Teladoc Health Forum 2023 July 17-19 | Boston, MA
Teladoc Health will be attending many other events in the upcoming year. Join us! <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/events/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=NWSLTR-202302-EMP-CC-NEWSLETTER-FEB&utm_campaign_id=CC02]]>
In the news Teladoc Health launches fully integrated whole-person care experience with new app <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/newsroom/press/release/Teladoc-Health-Launches-Fully-Integrated-Whole-Person-Care-Experience-with-New-App/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=NWSLTR-202302-EMP-CC-NEWSLETTER-FEB&utm_campaign_id=CC02/]]>
Teladoc Health reaches 50-million visit milestone <[[https://www.globenewswire.com/news-release/2022/11/15/2556582/0/en/Teladoc-Health-Reaches-50-Million-Visit-Milestone.html]]>
The member experience Chad “My whole experience [with the program] has been nothing short of phenomenal.” Chad L., Diabetes Management member since 2012. Watch Chad’s story <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/resources/video/member-testimonial-chad/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=NWSLTR-202302-EMP-CC-NEWSLETTER-FEB&utm_campaign_id=CC02]]>
Engagement center Discover our Getting started-focused assets <[[https://engagementcenter.com/Search?src=searchresults_filterby%20Getting%20Started&ShopBy=152]]>
From registration instructions to detailed program materials, we have what you need to ensure your population is engaged with the Teladoc Health services you’re offering in 2023.
About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
